name: ANCRDT_INSTRMNT_C generation rule
description: This generation rule aims to describe the generation of ANCRDT_INSTRMNT_C table within BIRD.
algorithm:
SET ANCRDT_INSTRMNT_C.INSTRMNT_ID = BIRD_INSTRMNT_EIL.INSTRMNT_ID
WHERE BIRD_INSTRMNT_EIL.INSTRMNT_ID IN (
    SELECT BIRD_INSTRMNT_EIL.INSTRMNT_ID
    FROM BIRD_INSTRMNT_EIL
    JOIN BIRD_INSTRMNT_ENTTY_RL_ASSGNMNT_EIL
      ON BIRD_INSTRMNT_ENTTY_RL_ASSGNMNT_EIL.INSTRMNT_ID = BIRD_INSTRMNT_EIL.INSTRMNT_ID
    JOIN BIRD_ENTTY_RL_EIL
      ON BIRD_ENTTY_RL_EIL.PRTY_ID = BIRD_INSTRMNT_ENTTY_RL_ASSGNMNT_EIL.PRTY_ID
    WHERE BIRD_ENTTY_RL_EIL.AGGRGTD_CMMTMNT_AMNT_ANCRDT_RPRTNG >= 25000
);

logical_transformation_rule.algorithm:
SET ANCRDT_INSTRMNT_C.INSTRMNT_ID = BIRD_INSTRMNT_EIL.INSTRMNT_ID
WHERE BIRD_INSTRMNT_EIL.INSTRMNT_ID IN (
    SELECT BIRD_INSTRMNT_EIL.INSTRMNT_ID
    FROM BIRD_INSTRMNT_EIL
    JOIN BIRD_INSTRMNT_ENTTY_RL_ASSGNMNT_EIL
      ON BIRD_INSTRMNT_ENTTY_RL_ASSGNMNT_EIL.INSTRMNT_ID = BIRD_INSTRMNT_EIL.INSTRMNT_ID
    JOIN BIRD_ENTTY_RL_EIL
      ON BIRD_ENTTY_RL_EIL.PRTY_ID = BIRD_INSTRMNT_ENTTY_RL_ASSGNMNT_EIL.PRTY_ID
    WHERE BIRD_ENTTY_RL_EIL.AGGRGTD_CMMTMNT_AMNT_ANCRDT_RPRTNG >= 25000
);
